(S/U Only)


Audience: Advanced high or Superior speakers of English as an additional language
Purpose: To refine your academic and professional speaking 
Day/Time: To be determined based on enrolled students' Fall schedules
ELSP 520 is designed to improve the academic and professional speaking performance of Advanced High and Superior level students (OPI Levels 3.7-4.0). ELSP 520 provides an environment in which students practice self-selected professional and academic speaking tasks. This course will help participants improve performance when completing complex, linguistic tasks over a variety of topics; advance their ability to use explanation and exemplification to construct coherent arguments and hypotheses; and attend to and self-correct pronunciation or grammatical errors that are patterned. Participants meet as a group for discussions, presentations, and classroom activities, as well as with the course instructor for one-on-one consultations.
Contact: Heather Boldt, ELSP Director, hboldt@emory.edu
